title: Lamb chops with pomegranate-port reduction
ingredients: ['1 lemon, zested and juiced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '8 lamb chops', '120ml fresh unsweetened pomegranate juice', '235ml port wine', '2 tablespoons pomegranate seeds']
